Summary: light Blue missle very bright nothing i ever seen before!
divs: Sighting DetailsWell i was on the couch on my computer about to go to bed then i looked out my window when it flew over head from my house to the next building across from me say 20 feet away it was low enough to all most land on the roof it just bolted across and then dissapeared it just vanished I'm still looking but see nothing! it was a light Blue in color very bright i knew it was not a plain or helicopter it had no flashing light it was just a solid light Blue color.
